titleStmt.title: Galusha A. Grow to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2998

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, 1859-1862

body.p:
House of Representatives, U. S.
December 4th 1861
Hon. B. Magoffin
Govr State of Kentucky,
Sir,

In compliance with the order of the House of Representatives I enclose you herewith a resolution of that body declaring vacant the seat held by Henry C. Burnett one of the representatives of the state of Kentucky in the House of Representatives of the United States.

I am very respectfully
Your Obt Servant
Galusha A. Grow
Speaker
Resolution Expelling H. C. Burnett from Congress
